title: Live From New York, It's A New Voice
teaser: Saturday Night Live has announced that long-time former cast member Darrell Hammond will rejoin the show as the new voice of the program.
contentencoded:
Saturday Night Live has announced that long-time former cast member Darrell Hammond will rejoin the show as the new voice of the program.

The legendary Don Pardo died last month at the age of 96 and had been the voice of Saturday Night Live for 39 seasons.
